welcome.title: What is ViaDe_ES1C?
welcome.presentation: ViaDe is a decentralized application for track management. It is developed in the Solid web ecosystem. It allows us to visualize our tracks, share them with our friends, download and upload them.

routes.title: Visualize tracks
routes.loadWarningMessage: There is no track in the POD
routes.imageErrorMessage: There are no permissions to access to images or are not found
routes.videoErrorMessage: There are no permissions to access to videos or are not found

share.title: Share my tracks
share.createSharePrompt: Choose who you want to share tracks with
share.errorFriends: There's no friend/group selected to share
share.successShareMessage: Your tracks have been shared with
share.errorCreateMessage: There was a problem sharing with
share.warningShareMessage: Track has been alredy shared with
share.errorPermissionMessage: You are not allowed to access to this folder -
share.warningDeleteMessage: Track's copy has not been removed correctly
share.warningLoadMessage: There are no tracks to share
share.errorFriendsFolder: Folder not found in friend's pod -
share.errorMyPermissionsMessage: Correctly configure your permissions for sharing with
share.errorEmptyTracks: There are no tracks to share

upload.title: Upload my tracks
upload.uploadPrompt: Choose the files of the tracks you want to upload
upload.errorMessage: You must upload a file with extension ".json"
upload.errorPermissionsMessage: There are no permissions to upload

download.loadWarningMessage: There is no track in the POD
